name: 211 Nation Wide
description: 2-1-1 is a nation-wide service connecting over 14 million people to services every year. to get help, you can search for local resources through your local 2-1-1 provider, or simply call 2-1-1.

locations.name: 211.org
locations.description: 2-1-1 is a free confidential service that helps people across the U.S. and in many parts of Canada find the local resources they need.

schedules.description: 24 hours a day, seven days a week

services.name: TJ-3000
services.description: Speak with a live, highly trained service professional in your area. All calls are confidential.

schedules.description: 24 hours a day, seven days a week
